TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ViewStateService extends System.Object

summary.span: 在运行工作流应用程序期间的特定时间点，允许保留和访问与工作流应用程序的用户交互组件相关联的所有数据值。

span.span: Enables the preservation and accessing of all data values associated with the user interaction components of a workflow application, at a particular point in time in the running of a workflow application.

summary.span: 一个存储了模型项的视图状态的 。

span.span: A stores view states for model items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这非常有用，因为它使得在应用程序的控制进入或离开回发时，都可以检索状态。This is useful so that the state can keep being retrieved when control of the application goes and comes with postbacks. 是一个抽象类。 is an abstract class. 派生类必须在调用 时存储视图状态，并在调用 时检索这些视图状态。Derived classes must store view states when is called, and retrieve them when is called.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，记录由指定键表示的项的当前设置，使它可供撤消操作使用。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, records the current setting of the item represented by the specified key so that it is available for an undo operation.

summary.span: 然后，由指定键表示的项存储到指定模型项的视图状态中。

span.span: The item represented by the specified key is then stored in the view state of the specified model item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可通过调用 并传递与 `modelItem` 和 `key` 相同的值，来检索存储的对象。You can retrieve the stored object by calling and passing the same values for `modelItem` and `key`.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract event System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateChangedEventHandler UndoableViewStateChanged;
.event class System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateChangedEventHandler UndoableViewStateChanged
Public MustOverride Event UndoableViewStateChanged As ViewStateChangedEventHandler
public: abstract event System::Activities::Presentation::View::ViewStateChangedEventHandler ^ UndoableViewStateChanged;

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，声明一个事件，用于通知已经对控件的可撤消视图状态进行了更改。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, declares an event that signals that a change has been made to the control’s undoable view state.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，声明一个事件，用于通知已经对控件的视图状态进行了更改。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, declares an event that signals that a change has been made to the control’s view state.
